mcq.statement: Who primarily influenced the Congress to launch the Swadeshi movement against the Partition of Bengal?

options.c: Hindu business community of West Bengal

mcq.one_liner: The Swadeshi movement was launched by Congress mainly at the behest of the **Hindu business community of West Bengal**, who dominated the Congress and opposed the Partition of Bengal.

suggestions.topic: Calcutta to Delhi Shift / Annulment of Partition (1911)
Calcutta to Delhi Shift / Annulment of Partition (1911)
